bean.description: This bean provides the domain service of the application, used by the web interface and the command-line calls. It must implement interface org.esupportail.lecture.domain.DomainService. The only property that should be modified by users is displayNameLdapAttribute (see below).

property.name: daoService
property.description: A reference to the DAO service, used to access the database.

property.name: ldapService
property.description: A reference to the LDAP service, used to access the LDAP directory.

property.name: displayNameLdapAttribute
property.description: The name of the LDAP attribute used to retrieve the display name of the users from the LDAP directory.
